item.title: Uses
item.description: Tools I Use (Inspired by awesome-uses) Development Environment Visual Studio Code (or Intellij, or Vim. But mostly VSCode) A side note about Vim - I’m comfortable with it, but (no longer) evangelical about it. It’s an editor, it’s fast, and I now know it well enough that it stays out of my way. I’m sure if I bothered to configure nano, I’d feel the same about that. Konsole Zsh (+ antibody to manage plugins) I currently use PopOS with the default (Gnome-derived) theme.
